name: False Disguise
description:
This is just another incomplete PS1 retro-style horror game for a game jam and of course, inspired by Resident Evil Trilogy.

Game Duration: 4 to 6 minutes

It's Halloween Party BUT your wife is missing! So, what do you have to do? You gotta find her of course. She's stuck somewhere and it could be nasty.

Controls:
W and S for Forward and Backward Movement
A and D for Turning
Enter or E to interact or inspect
Left Mouse Click to shoot
